channel.title: Someone help me please I have a modem but I would like a WEBCLIENT
channel.description:

item.title: Someone help me please I have a modem but I would like a WEBCLIENT
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Owner Zachs, post:1, topic:379848”]Well I see that you need a router for a private server and I do not have that should I try hitachi or whatever its called?

Please Reply[/quote]
hamachi*
and No, you do not need a router, the difference is you won’t have to do port forwarding. Just install no-ip as normal and follow the normal stepe
